show_name: Oniichan no Koto Nanka Zenzen Suki Janain Dakara ne—!! (TV)
other_title: Because I Don't Like My Big Brother At All--!!
お兄ちゃんのことなんかぜんぜん好きじゃないんだからねっ!! (Japanese)
plot: Junior High student Nao's brother complex is so strong, it's almost at the point of incest. She's determined to make her brother, High School student Shuusuke, see her as a woman. So determined, that she goes as far as going into his room to throw away all his non-incest related porn. But as she's looking for his porno stash, she finds a photo album... and she's not in any of his childhood pictures.
ending_theme: "Ari Ari Mirai" (アリアリ未来☆) by Eri Kitamura, Marina Inoue, and Kazusa Aranami
